settings_screen.title: SMS Dashboard
settings_screen.subtitle: Here's where you can buy your SMS and set up your Campaigns. Any doubts? Press

country_list.title: SMS Campaign active countries
country_list.subtitle: Add every country you will send SMS to. If you do not add any countries, you will not be able to send SMS campaigns.

price_container.title: Available funds
price_container.alert: Your account's negative balance will be deducted from your next payment.
price_container.legend_1: These funds will only be available tu use in SMS Campaigns.
price_container.legend_2: The cost for each SMS will depend on which country you send it to. Be aware that actual costs may be different than shown.
price_container.legend_3: Estimate every SMS cost before purchase.

delivery_options.title: Delivery options
delivery_options.EnableShippingSchedules: Only in a certain time interval (considering the time zone of the destination country)

settings_screen.no_more_countries: You've selected all the available countries.

calc_credit_screen.title: Cost estimator
calc_credit_screen.subtitle: Before your purchase, you can estimate the total cost of your SMS campaign by indicating the destination countries and how many SMS you want to send. Any doubts? Press
calc_credit_screen.legal_1: SMS prices are only estimates and don't include taxes. Actual prices will be displayed at the time of sending.
calc_credit_screen.legal_2_part2: for more information on how billing for this service works.
calc_credit_screen.contact_us: Are you interested in a Custom Plan?

buy_screen.title: Select payment method
buy_screen.subtitle: Choose how you want to pay for your SMS.
buy_screen.error_msg: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again.

processing.title: We are processing your purchase
processing.description: This process may take a few minutes. Remember that patience is a virtue.

tr.description: We are verifying your funds transfer. We'll notify you by Email when they are credited in your account.

cc.description: Funds were credited in your account. You are set to send SMS Campaigns.
